entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets overnight. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets changing to periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
